summary: This module implements a material‑design side navigation rail UI component for the Flet Python SDK. It provides a configurable vertical rail that can be placed on the left or right edge of an application, manages a collection of destination items, and exposes properties for selection, label display, animation, theming, and layout.
business_intent: Allow developers to quickly add a standards‑compliant vertical navigation rail to their Flet applications, enabling users to switch between a limited set of primary views with consistent visual styling and interaction behavior.
